events.name: GDG KEFFI MAIDEN EVENT
events.description:
GDGkeffi will host it First event.
Agendas to be discussed include the following.
1. Introduction to Google Developer Group.
2. Introduction to Android development
3. Introduction to Cloud Computing
4. Web development
5. Introduction to PHP Console.

You are all welcome to our first maiden event, we will be deliberating on What GDG is, benefit of being in GDG, and some insights on Android/web development.
When coming participants/members should bring Laptop, pen and paper for jotting if necessary.
events.how_to_find_us: You can find us on Twitter: @Gdgkeffi, Facebook:GDGkeffi, Mail us at: Gdgkeffi@gmail.com

events.name: Google IO18 Extended Keffi
events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer conference intended to enrich participants with new Google Technologies.
Since not everyone can make it all the way to San Francisco, so to bring I/O into local communities worldwide, GDGs are organizing event series called I/O Extended. The event will bring local developer community together to experience talks and watch keynote from the IO, Product demos, Speaker Sessions and Codelabs.
We will do:
1. Watch keynote 18.
2. Flutter (codelabs)
3. Machine learning (introduction).
What to bring.
1 . Power cord
2. Laptop
3. Attention.

events.name: Google Cloud Next 18 Extended- Keffi
events.description:
Details

Join us for this year's Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year, we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC (Kubernetes, ML, or Google Cloud Certification) lab, and local speakers.

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (a $55+ value)!

Don't forget to bring a laptop (PC, Mac, or Chromebook), and get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event, and visit https://cloudnext.withgoogle.com/ to learn more about Google Cloud Next '18

events.name: Devfest 18 Keffi

venue.name: Ta'al Model E-Library keffi
venue.address_1: opposite New Keffi hotel, Along Akwanga road keffi

events.description:
Devfest 2018 is our annual developer festival which brings all the great developers under one roof.
We will deliberate on topics from Android, Cloud, Machine Learning, Web, and Digital well being.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Keffi

venue.name: Ta'al Model E-Library keffi
venue.address_1: opposite New Keffi hotel, Along Akwanga road keffi

events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but
don't know where to begin? Join us for our
Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free
of charge. Together we'll work through several
Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on
experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes,
Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free
access to more labs you can finish at home.
Complete all labs in the quest and earn a
Google-hosted badge for your online profile,
and additional 30 days access to the training
platform to compete any labs you want Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or
Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest
versions of the popular browsers. For the best
experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or
Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger

events.name: IWD 19 Keffi

venue.name: Ta'al Model E-Library keffi
venue.address_1: opposite New Keffi hotel, Along Akwanga road keffi

events.description:
Women Techmakers ( WTM ) creates visibility and resources for women to thrive.
Women Techmakers Keffi celebrates international women's day (IWD) to highlight the talent of women in technology which focuses on community-building initiative to promote talented and passionate women, increase their visibility and empower them with resources in technology to develop and excel in their careers.

organizers.name: AGBO FARUQ R.
organizers.bio: I am Umar Faruq Ibn Ibraheem, A Web Front End Developer and A Graphic Designer,A System Analyst, Wizard of the first Typing Order and A little bit of Hacking.

group_profile.intro: I am me, myself and I, A Tech Enthusiast, Community Builder, Graphic Learner an Ingressive Campus Ambassador and Google Student Ambassador, If you are not talking tech you don't want me talking, A fan of AI and a friend of Java, and A Code Reader
